file_structure.src/components/ui/: Base UI primitives (Button, Input, Textarea, Label, Skeleton, Toast, ErrorBoundary)

integration_in_host.next_js_app_router: Host creates admin route group (e.g., app/(admin)/)
integration_in_host.example_dashboard_page: import { DashboardPage } from '@structcms/admin'; export default function AdminDashboard() { return <DashboardPage />; }
integration_in_host.example_page: import { PageEditor } from '@structcms/admin'; export default function EditPage({ params }) { return <PageEditor slug={params.slug} />; }
integration_in_host.provider_setup: Wrap admin routes with AdminProvider passing registry and API base URL

notes: All components receive registry from AdminProvider context
Form generation uses React Hook Form + Zod resolver
Components are headless-friendly but styled by default
API calls use fetch() to configured base URL
No drag & drop - explicit out of scope

backlog.description: React context provider for registry, API base URL, and shared state

Exposes useAdmin() hook for context access
Provides useApiClient() hook for API calls
Unit test: context values accessible in child components

backlog.description: Admin layout with sidebar navigation, header, and content area

backlog.feature: Add Array and Object Cases to FormGenerator

acceptance_criteria: FormGenerator renders ArrayField for array field types
FormGenerator renders ObjectField for object field types
Unit test: array and object fields render correct components

backlog.description: createApiClient is called every render without memoization, causing useCallback dependencies to be ineffective
acceptance_criteria: createApiClient wrapped in useMemo keyed on apiBaseUrl
Remove eslint-disable comments in PageList and MediaBrowser

backlog.description: Three conflicting NavItem types: navigation-editor, admin-layout, and unused NavigationItem from core
ToastProvider is separate, no component uses toast for feedback. Consumer must manually nest providers
acceptance_criteria: useToast() works inside AdminProvider without extra nesting

backlog.description: Each SectionEditor has its own submit button, unsubmitted changes are silently lost when Save Page is clicked
acceptance_criteria: Section data syncs to PageEditor on field change (onChange/onBlur)
Save Page captures all current section data without per-section submit
Unit test: unsaved section data is included in Save Page

backlog.description: Main dashboard with KPI cards, recent pages, and quick actions
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard route exists and is default admin entry
KPI cards display correct counts (pages, media, navigation, sections)
Recent pages list loads and links correctly (max 10, sorted by updatedAt DESC)
Quick actions navigate to proper flows (create page, upload media)
Responsive layout works on tablet viewport
Loading states show during data fetching
Error states display gracefully with retry options
Sections KPI derives from registry using registry.getAllSections().length
Navigation uses callback props pattern (onNavigate, onSelectPage)
Recent pages uses client-side filtering like PageList component

backlog.description: Metrics display with skeleton loaders and error handling
acceptance_criteria: Shows sections count from registry using registry.getAllSections().length

backlog.description: List of recently updated pages with error fallbacks
acceptance_criteria: Fetches all pages from /api/cms/pages (same as PageList)
Client-side filtering: sort by updatedAt DESC, limit to 10
Shows page title, slug, and last updated timestamp
Uses onSelectPage callback prop for navigation (like PageList)
Error state shows 'Unable to load recent pages'

backlog.description: Action buttons that don't require API calls
acceptance_criteria: Uses callback props: onCreatePage() and onUploadMedia()
Create New Page button triggers onCreatePage callback
Upload Media button triggers onUploadMedia callback
Styled consistently with shadcn/ui Button components

backlog.description: ErrorBoundary has no reset mechanism, user must reload the page after an error
acceptance_criteria: Default error UI includes a Retry button
Retry resets error state and re-renders children
Unit test: reset clears error state

backlog.description: Toast counter is module-level variable, shared across all ToastProvider instances and SSR renders
acceptance_criteria: Toast ID generation uses useRef inside ToastProvider
